name: places/ChIJ9wMBJgRZwokROTet9kvJzbE
adrFormatAddress: 560 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

editorialSummary.text: Longtime shop offering custom framing, face mounting, photo printing, stretching & repair service.

originalText.text: These guys are amazing. I’ve been going there for years, even after moving to Brookkyn, I still go to Yosof and his team when I need something framed. They do a fantastic job framing silk scarves. I’ve had both Hermes and Pucci scarves framed here at a fraction of the cost of other stores and the quality is exceptional.

text.text: These guys are amazing. I’ve been going there for years, even after moving to Brookkyn, I still go to Yosof and his team when I need something framed. They do a fantastic job framing silk scarves. I’ve had both Hermes and Pucci scarves framed here at a fraction of the cost of other stores and the quality is exceptional.

originalText.text: Yosof goes above and beyond to give the best possible service! He spent so much time looking through prints with me making sure I got the right sizes and made excellent recommendations for frames- he convinced me to use a black frame for one piece of artwork instead of rust and white for another piece instead of black, and he was so right! He went the extra mile and not only printed out great quality pictures for me, but changed the glass on some frames I bought myself, and cut certain photos to make sure they fit those frames perfectly. So glad he was there to guide me and that I listened to him. He is always so warm, friendly, and eager to help and even delivered the frames free of charge. He also gives great prices, I'm so happy I walked in his store! Thank you Yosof!!

originalText.text:
Last month I brought a project to Decor.  The New Yorker magazine ran an article about my work at NYC Parks, which included a personal caricature.  I purchased an original print of the caricature and asked Decor to frame it for me as a gift for my parents.  Yosof suggested I also include a copy of the article as a second panel in the frame.  He offered to do the layout if I could send him a link to the article.  I wasn't confident in how it look but I decided to take his advice and go for it.  When I picked it up a couple weeks later, I was absolutely delighted to see how well it turned out.  The quality of workmanship was immediately apparent.  The caricature and article were laid out in perfectly balanced symmetry within the frame.  Decor clearly put significant effort and care into creating this new family keepsake.  My parents absolutely love it and have featured it prominently in their house.  I have since recommended Decor to several friends and associates.  I look forward to working with them again.
- Nate Grove

originalText.text:
I have now purchased 3 different pieces from Decor Art Gallery and will continue to be a repeat customer in the future. Yosof and his nephew, Mike, provide the highest class of customer service that's rare to find these days while offering a wide array of art choices for many different preferences.

Several months ago, I purchased a large custom piece made by Mike (IG @musqas) that hangs as my living room center piece I couldn't be happier with and is truly one of a kind. This past Wednesday I had the pleasure of meeting Yosof, the owner, who couldn't have been more helpful with both selection and framing options. Both have been an absolute pleasure to get to know and I can not more highly recommend a store visit and purchase at this location.

Best,
Alex

originalText.text: Great experience here. Isaac was super friendly and he helped us figure out how to frame some very heavy Italian tiles into a solid frame that we could use as a tray or hang on the wall. Definitely recommend for people looking to frame something special to them.
